shared.model.player

Class PlayerPieces

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.model.player.PlayerPieces

  • public class PlayerPieces
extends java.lang.Object
    The PlayerPieces class keeps track of a players settlements and cities. It has methods for checking if a player has available settlements, cities, or roads for placement Domain: ArrayList roads: each player has an array of 15 roads ArrayList settlements: each player has an array of 5 settlements ArrayList cities: each player has an array of 4 cities
